Name: The Alchemist
About the game: Play the role of an apprentice alchemist on the road in a merchant caravan. During the journey you will discover many things, including love? The Alchemist is a gay medieval fantasy visual novel . You play as an apprentice alchemist on a journey in a merchant caravan. There, you will meet colorful characters, discover their way of seeing the world and maybe experience an intense romance... The Alchemist is a story focused game with meaningful choices. You will get caught in the middle of hostilities between two neighboring kingdoms. The choices you make will influence the outcome of the conflict as well as your future. Features Wordcount - 65K~ in the full game, 4.5K~ in the demo Estimated duration - 2h30-3h/route, 9h for the overall in the full game, 25min for the demo Endings - 15 love endings, 6 professions ending, 3 world events endings CGs /illustrations - 18
